name: Ekko Adventures
description:
This game is about Ekko, the champion of 'League of Legends' who is trapped in a dungeon, and you need to help him to escape.
You will need to use his abilities in order to get to the exit door.
You can use his Timewinder to defeat the radioactive slimes who populate the dungeon.
You can use his rewind device to go back to the position that you were 4 seconds ago!.
Some buttons will open doors but will trap you in a room without exit, in this case, use your rewind device to leave the room!

------------------------------------

Credits:
Daniel Lizano - Game, player and enemies textures, and minor tweaks on the tiles

Music : https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-lofi-cactu-sama - www.youtube.com/c/Tadon
